long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cliniq Apps Communication Center is designed to streamline your workflow and enhance team collaboration.
The powerful task manager helps you stay organized and up to date with your patients and referrers. Create tasks, keep track of their progression, use guide scripts and actions for seamless completion. Additionally, the secure chat enables real-time collaboration, file sharing and group discussion, ensuring your team stays connected and productive.
Install the Communication Center extension and sign in with your Cliniq Apps account to enjoy the benefits of seamless task management and secure communication directly from your browser, ensuring productivity at all times.
